name: The Gypsy
description: Unlike many vodka-based drinks that simply use the spirit to lend alcoholic oomph to a mixture of soda and fruit juice, the Gypsy uses vodka's neutral character to soften the powerful flavor of the drink's other main ingredient, the French herbal liqueur Benedictine.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well to chill, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
